survival.title: Survival
survival.description: Compete against your friends in a Battle Royale to see who is the best at interview questions.

training.title: Training
training.description: Practice answering a series of questions on a chosen topic that you may be asked in interviews.

simulation.title: Simulation
simulation.description: Do a mock interview with a friend or with the help of a teacher to see how an interview goes.

database.title: Database
database.description: Become a database beast to devour your friends

network.title: Network
network.description: Become a networked war machine to DDOS your colleagues

frontend.title: Web - Front
frontend.description: Become a prophet in Web-Front to bring the good word to your friends

backend.title: Web - Back
backend.description: Are you a Web-Back admiral? Shirohige will put you to the test

oop.title: Object-oriented programming
oop.description: Where there's a will there's a way, but can you do this training in Prog Object?

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: You're a noob' said the rager, so come and get some experience here

personnal.title: Personnal
personnal.description: Talking about yourself is an art, have you mastered it?

php.title: PHP
php.description: Demonic language indeed, now is the time to change your mind

softskills.title: Soft Skills
softskills.description: Check here if you have skills applicable to all trades

random.title: Random theme
random.description: The training of the young Padawan

all.title: All theme
all.description: The training of the Shaolin Warrior

nbplayers.title: Number of players
nbplayers.error: The number of players must be between 2 and 10!
